entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the people who loves the subject Muggle Studies. He is described as being top in anything for the first time.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the people who loves the subject Muggle Studies. He is described as being top in anything for the first time.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: Alecto is mentioned as the sister of Amycus and teaches Muggle Studies. She is described as explaining how Muggles are like animals and how they drove wizards into hiding.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: Amycus is mentioned as Alecto's brother and teaches Muggle Studies with his sister.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the one who got a smart mouth for asking how much Muggle blood Alecto and her brother have. He is also described as standing up to Alecto and giving everyone hope.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who told Neville that there's a time and a place for getting a smart mouth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who stood up to Alecto in the past and gave everyone hope.

relationships.description: Neville stood up to Alecto, giving everyone hope.
Harry stood up to Alecto in the past and gave everyone hope.
